body_html:
@patrickpoirson so far no luck - I'm pretty sure it's a really simple fix and that we just need to change out the input layer from a VideoInput to a blob or something then just run something like

data = np.random.rand(N, C, H, W) // aka your actual np arrays of video frames
workspace.FeedBlob("data", data)
body:
@patrickpoirson so far no luck - I'm pretty sure it's a really simple fix and that we just need to change out the input layer from a VideoInput to a blob or something then just run something like
```
data = np.random.rand(N, C, H, W) // aka your actual np arrays of video frames
workspace.FeedBlob("data", data)
```
